data.eml:eml: A new species of Sphenomorphus Fitzinger, 1843 (Squamata: Sauria: Scincidae) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Nguyen, Truong Quang, Nguyen, Khoi Vu, Devender, Robert Wayne Van, Bonkowski, Michael, Ziegler, Thomas (2013): A new species of Sphenomorphus Fitzinger, 1843 (Squamata: Sauria: Scincidae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3734 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.1.6
